CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y             mercurial subversion openssh-client locales clang-format-3.5             silversearcher-ag             shellcheck             --no-install-recommends && rm -r /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&     ln -s /usr/bin/clang-format-3.5 /usr/bin/clang-format
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /opt &&     git clone https://github.com/phacility/libphutil.git &&     git clone https://github.com/phacility/arcanist.git &&     git clone https://github.com/vhbit/clang-format-linter.git &&     git clone https://devcentral.nasqueron.org/source/shellcheck-linter.git &&     wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/git/git/master/contrib/completion/git-completion.bash &&     cd /home/app &&     ln -s /opt/arcanist/bin/arc /usr/local/bin/arc &&     ln -s /opt/config/gitconfig /root/.gitconfig &&     ln -s /opt/config/arcrc /root/.arcrc
Commands.Name: run
